name: New City Hoopers
description: A dedicated youth basketball team striving for excellence on and off the court. Support our journey to the regional championship!

name: Rockland Raptors

name: Hudson Valley Thunder
description: A talented youth basketball squad committed to excellence, discipline, and sportsmanship. Help us fund our tournament season!
